article_title: Parents Sue Dentist Over Abuse Allegations
article_text:
A Jacksonville dentist is being sued after several parents claimed he abused child patients, the Florida Times-Union reports. Four people filed the class-action lawsuit against Howard Schneider, who is under an active investigation by the Florida Attorney General’s Office.

Allegations include a child being grabbed and slapped, patients being choked into unconsciousness and several children having multiple teeth removed unnecessarily, the Times-Union reports. There have also been protests in recent weeks outside of his office.

article_summary:
A Jacksonville dentist is being sued after several parents claimed he abused child patients, the Florida Times-Union reports.
Allegations include a child being grabbed and slapped, patients being choked into unconsciousness and several children having multiple teeth removed unnecessarily, the Times-Union reports.
Four people filed the class-action lawsuit against Howard Schneider, who is under an active investigation by the Florida Attorney General’s Office.
There have also been protests in recent weeks outside of his office.
